import React from "react"; const tableStyle = { color: "black", border: "1px solid black", padding: "8px", fontFamily: "Trattatello" }; const hourlyTable = { color: "black", border: "1px solid black", padding: "8px", fontFamily: "Trattatello", fontSize: "10px", }; export const MultiDayWeatherForecast = ({forecast}) => { return (
{forecast.forecastday[0].hour.map(hour => ( ))}
Time Weather Temperature Humidity Max Wind Speed (MPH)
{hour.time} {hour.maxtemp_f} F / {hour.mintemp_f} F {hour.avghumidity}% {hour.maxwind_mph}
{forecast.forecastday.map(day => ( ))}
Date Weather Temperature Humidity Max Wind Speed (MPH)
{day.date} {day.day.maxtemp_f} F / {day.day.mintemp_f} F {day.day.avghumidity}% {day.day.maxwind_mph}
) }
